Who am I?

About Me

Life is about finding new ways to learn.

I believe that cheese goes with anything. I have the perfect jacket for any situation. For me, coding is a mental challenge, an outlet for personal expression, and a way to help other people, all wrapped up in a little metal box.

Technologies

Here's what I've been working with.

Copyright © 2017

FallSafe

My hand-rolled physics engine models a dynamic rope using only vanilla JavaScript. The simulation tests the strength of climbing protection in a lead fall.

  • Live Link
  • Learn More

Barebnb

Built with Ruby on Rails, React/Redux, PostgreSQL, and Google Maps API. Users can find, create, book, and review spots for rent.

  • Live Link
  • Learn More
